name.description: Name of SmartSearch instances as seen in DC/OS.

cpus.description: Number of logical cores to allocate to each service instance.

mem.description: Memory in Mb to allocate to each service instance.

disk.description: Disk (MB) to allocate to the janusgraph instance.

cassandra_hostnames.description: Comma seperated values of the hostnames of the cassandra nodes to connect to.

constraints.description: Marathon constraints for the framework/scheduler instance. Valid constraint operators are one of UNIQUE, CLUSTER, GROUP_BY, LIKE, UNLIKE.
